name: Table Manners
description:
Table Manners is a single-player turn-based strategy game set in the Regency Era at a series of dinner parties. Your aim? To insult, belittle and humiliate other party guests until they are forced to excuse themselves. The last person standing is declared the winner.
A full-length campaign chronicling your rise to infamy
Dozens of classes to unlock, each with a unique special move and passive bonus
Predict your opponents' behavior, forcing them to waste their abilities by anticipating attacks and parrying them
Choose the perfect team to take along to encounters, dominating dinner parties even when the odds are stacked against you
Outsmart, offend, overcome. Go down in history as the sharpest-tongued dukes and dames in the county.
